alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 5:33PM MDT until July 08 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MEADE...SOUTHEASTERN LAWRENCE AND WEST CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 533 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles southeast of Roubaix Lake, or 15 miles southeast of Lead, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Summerset, Nemo, Silver City, Pactola Reservoir, Roubaix Lake and Dalton Lake. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 48 and 49. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
